data.name: Tic Tac Toe LOUNGE
data.detailed_description:
Enter Tic Tac Toe LOUNGE!


Our sophisticated AI system feels like you're playing against another human - just choose whether your opponent should play normal or strong. Neither do you play against an extremely stupid opponent (who acts only at random), nor against an unbeatable algorithm.
data.about_the_game:
Enter Tic Tac Toe LOUNGE!


Our sophisticated AI system feels like you're playing against another human - just choose whether your opponent should play normal or strong. Neither do you play against an extremely stupid opponent (who acts only at random), nor against an unbeatable algorithm.
data.short_description: The coolest, most entertaining and smartest version of Tic Tac Toe you'll find!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel / AMD
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX
  • Storage: 135 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel / AMD
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX
  • Storage: 135 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
